name: Blind Adventure
description:
The game "Blind Adventure" is a simulator of blind man.

It means, that your game character is invisible and you have to

orientate yourself at level by ear and surrounding sounds.

As for me the gameplay is original, but as far as it is interesting

for you I leave it to you. Available two languages: Eng and Rus.

System requirements:

It would be better to have get good-quality stereo sound system

(or it's better 5.1) to hear clearly from what side a sound is being

uttering and have not the worst videocard.

Maybe later, if there is interest in this game on your part,

I'll make some more levels.
